Create a story about a cheetah who discovers a new way to express its speed and agility through dance.
Write a poem about a cheetah that is too slow to run but finds joy in watching the world go by.
Write a short play about a cheetah that is struggling to keep up with its pride and must find new ways to contribute.
Create a comic strip about a cheetah that is determined to find a way to run faster, despite its limitations.
Write a non-fiction article about the physiology of cheetahs and how they are able to run at such high speeds.
